formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: On Increment 5, Test 16, the final compiled output has an incomplete body for the F!.

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: The code in the DropUnreached pass would consider any unnamed node in the function body, including a Condition node, instead of only considering unnamed expressions when determining whether code is unreachable or not. This resulted in dropping everything after a conditional. The fix is to require an additional check on the function that builds the unnamed expression map to ensure that any positive matches are actually Expression nodes.
